forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, the bustling city begins to reflect an inviting hush. The night sky is mostly clear, a gentle expanse punctuated by a few distant stars. With temperatures hovering around the mid-fifties, one can feel the cool embrace of a westerly breeze, lively enough to stir the trees and ruffle the edges of jackets. For those fortunate enough to wander outside, a light layer will serve well; perhaps a cozy cardigan or a soft jacket will keep the evening chill at bay.

Looking to tomorrow, the promise of sunshine greets the day, hinting at a high near sixty-four. The sun will cast its warm glow, but be prepared for temperatures that may dip slightly in the afternoon. A brisk wind, playful and spirited, will dance along the streets, making it an ideal day for a stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely bike ride through Golden Gate Park. The beauty of tomorrow lies not just in the clear skies but also in the invigorating air, making it a perfect moment to savor a coffee from a local café while basking in the sun’s gentle warmth.
